# Modify HVAC Air Loop Fan Parameters

## Description
This measure modifies the selected air loop fan.

## Modeler Description
This measure modifies the selected air loop fan.

## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Taxonomy


## Arguments


### Air loop to apply change to (currently all is only option)

**Name:** air_loop,
**Type:** String,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

### Pressure rise (Pa)

**Name:** pressure_rise,
**Type:** Double,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

### Fan efficiency (%)

**Name:** fan_efficiency,
**Type:** Double,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false

### Motor efficiency (%)

**Name:** motor_efficiency,
**Type:** Double,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false
